# Creating graphics with ggplot2

Read the [Data Visualization chapter of R for Data Science](https://r4ds.had.co.nz/data-visualisation.html).

the `tidyverse` collection of packages, which includes the ggplot2 package.
But, if you haven't, go ahead and run:

```
install.packages("tidyverse")
```
